result.reason: The report is ambiguous and non-reproducible because the title suggests an RDP 6151 disconnect while the comments describe a password prompt after an unexpected shutdown.
result.approach: Ask for exact reproduction steps, logs/error text, and whether the failure is an RDP session disconnect or connection-file recovery/encryption issue after power loss.
